Main Thesis BENAAW-2.text: Some of the most prominent arguments against affirmative action are not sufficient to reject affirmative action.

Claim 1 BENAAW-2.text: Alternative action comes in competitive and non-competitive forms.

Claim 2 BENAAW-2.text: Some of the most prominent objections to affirmative action apply less effectively to non-competitive affirmative action.
